complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Setup Project Repository and Initial Configuration
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the project setup task into subtasks covering: 1) Repository initialization with React and TypeScript, 2) Tailwind CSS integration, 3) Project structure setup, and 4) Configuration verification
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Setting up a React TypeScript project requires multiple configuration steps including repository initialization, dependency installation, and structure setup. The complexity is moderate as it involves standard tools but requires careful configuration of tsconfig.json and other settings.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the Supabase configuration into subtasks for: 1) Project creation, 2) User-related tables setup, 3) Program-related tables setup, 4) Communication tables setup, and 5) Testing database connections
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Database schema design and implementation requires careful planning and execution. With 6+ tables to create with proper relationships, this task has moderate-high complexity requiring SQL knowledge and Supabase-specific configuration.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Seed Programs Table with Real Data
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the data seeding task into: 1) Data source identification, 2) Scraper/import tool development, 3) Data transformation and validation, and 4) Database insertion and verification
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves either developing a web scraper or manually collecting and formatting data for 50+ programs. The complexity is high due to the need for data collection, transformation, and ensuring data quality and consistency.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide authentication implementation into: 1) Email/password authentication setup, 2) Google OAuth integration, 3) User profile management, and 4) Session handling and logout functionality
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Authentication involves multiple flows (email/password and OAuth) and requires secure implementation. While Supabase simplifies this, proper integration with the frontend and handling edge cases adds complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the multi-step form into: 1) Form state management, 2) Step navigation UI, 3) Form validation, 4) Data submission to Supabase, and 5) Personalized recommendations display
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Multi-step forms require complex state management, validation across steps, and proper data handling. The personalized recommendations feature adds another layer of complexity requiring data processing and display logic.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the search feature into: 1) Search UI components, 2) Filter implementation, 3) Supabase query optimization, 4) Results display with pagination, and 5) Performance optimization
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Search functionality with multiple filters requires complex query building, state management, and UI considerations. Performance optimization for potentially large datasets adds significant complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down AI chat integration into: 1) Chat UI development, 2) xAI Grok 3 API integration, 3) Message handling and state management, 4) Chat history storage in Supabase, and 5) Error handling and fallbacks
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Integrating an external AI API with real-time chat functionality involves complex asynchronous operations, state management, and error handling. Storing chat history adds database complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Document Upload and AI Review
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide document handling into: 1) File upload UI, 2) Supabase Storage integration, 3) File type validation and processing, 4) AI service integration for document review, 5) Feedback display, and 6) Document management interface
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task combines file handling, storage integration, and AI processing, making it highly complex. It requires secure file uploads, proper metadata tracking, and integration with an AI service for document analysis.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the dashboard into: 1) Dashboard UI layout, 2) Application CRUD operations, 3) Status visualization, 4) Deadline tracking and alerts, and 5) Notes and details management
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Creating a dashboard with CRUD operations requires complex state management and UI considerations. The various status tracking features and deadline management add significant complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the calculator implementation into: 1) Calculator UI components, 2) Data fetching from Supabase, 3) Calculation logic implementation, and 4) Currency formatting and display
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: The calculator requires fetching multiple cost factors, implementing calculation logic, and properly formatting currency values. The complexity is moderate due to the need for accurate calculations and proper data handling.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down timeline development into: 1) Timeline UI components, 2) Milestone creation and management, 3) Interactive timeline visualization, and 4) Date and cost handling
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Creating an interactive timeline with user-defined milestones involves complex UI components, date handling, and state management. The visual nature of the timeline adds UI complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide offline functionality into: 1) Service worker setup, 2) Asset caching strategy, 3) Data synchronization mechanism, 4) Offline state management, and 5) Testing across network conditions
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Offline functionality requires complex service worker configuration, sophisticated caching strategies, and data synchronization logic. This is one of the more technically challenging aspects of modern web development.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down payment integration into: 1) Payment gateway SDK setup, 2) Payment flow UI, 3) Transaction processing and verification, 4) Subscription management, and 5) Error handling and security measures
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Payment integration involves security considerations, third-party API integration, and complex transaction flows. Handling different payment statuses and subscription management adds significant complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide email reminder setup into: 1) SendGrid API integration, 2) Email template creation, 3) Reminder scheduling logic, and 4) Delivery tracking and error handling
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Email integration requires third-party API configuration, template design, and scheduling logic. The complexity is moderate due to the need for reliable delivery and error handling.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down optimization into: 1) Asset minification and bundling, 2) Image optimization and lazy loading, 3) Mobile-responsive UI adjustments, and 4) Performance testing and monitoring
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Performance optimization requires technical knowledge of bundling, lazy loading, and responsive design. Meeting specific performance targets (<3s load time) on slow connections adds significant complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide localization into: 1) Currency formatting utility creation, 2) UI component updates for currency display, and 3) Testing with various monetary values
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Currency localization is relatively straightforward with the toLocaleString method, but requires consistent implementation across multiple components and thorough testing with different values.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down accessibility implementation into: 1) ARIA attribute integration, 2) Keyboard navigation enhancement, 3) Color contrast and visual accessibility, and 4) Accessibility testing and remediation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Accessibility requires detailed attention across all components and thorough testing. Meeting WCAG 2.1 AA standards involves addressing multiple aspects of the application including keyboard navigation and proper semantic markup.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide documentation into: 1) User guide development, 2) Developer documentation creation, and 3) Test plan documentation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Comprehensive documentation requires detailed knowledge of all system components and the ability to explain them clearly. The complexity comes from the breadth of topics to cover and ensuring accuracy across all documentation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down usability testing into: 1) Test plan and scenario development, 2) Participant recruitment, 3) Testing session facilitation, and 4) Feedback analysis and implementation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Usability testing with 20 participants requires significant planning, coordination, and analysis. The complexity comes from designing effective test scenarios and properly analyzing qualitative feedback.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide deployment and promotion into: 1) Netlify configuration and deployment, 2) Environment variable and security setup, and 3) Social media promotion campaign
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Deployment involves configuration of environment variables and build settings. The complexity is moderate due to the need for proper environment configuration and ensuring the application works in production.
